name: Kitten Kaboodle (Prototype)
description: Standard 2D platformer. Play as a mama cat, collect balls of string, get to your kittens to beat the level. There are portals (purple) and jump pads, advanced controls, wall-jumping, stuff you'd expect from a cat platformer game. There's a GUI, a high score tracker, and the controls are explained in the main menu. The only issue I can think of is that there's weird collision with the collectibles, otherwise it plays pretty well. Enjoy.
